title: Moon in Aries
summary: A brief emotional climate that runs hot and quick. Feelings surface fast, attention sharpens on immediate needs, and momentum builds through direct action.

meaning.headline: Emotions lean toward urgency and straightforward expression.

frames.text: With the Moon in Aries, moods speed up and prefer clear, direct outlets.
Feelings may motivate quick starts or decisive statements.
Energy rises when there is something concrete to tackle.
Short bursts of effort can relieve restlessness.

frictions: Feeling restless without a clear target
opportunities: Acting on small wins to build momentum
Notice the space, the switch you reach for, how you lean, your hands responding.

do: Name the priority and move on it.
Use physical activity to release tension.
Plan quick breaks so urgency does not overrun the day.
Notice the corner, the scarf you reach for, how you notice, your breath responding.
avoid: Pushing others faster than they consent
Treating every irritation as a fight
Making irreversible choices in a spike of feeling
Skipping safety steps to save time

reusable_lines.text: The mood moves quickly and wants direct outlets today.
Short, bold actions clear the air under this sky.

allowed_framing: Contextual language about pacing and consent

sources: Moon in Aries as short-term climate of initiative
